name: 3D Evil Dead Zombie Killer Shooting Guns - Scary Sniper Fighting Games
name_original: 3D Evil Dead Zombie Killer Shooting Guns - Scary Sniper Fighting Games
description:
You’ll be placed in a desolated city with no help but your machine guns. The zombies already know your location, so they’ll keep coming for you. Luckily, apart from the heavy guns, you managed to secure two early development weapons: a deadly nuke and a freeze them all grenade. Use them wisely, as the undead will get more and more cunning. Another vital piece of equipment at your disposal, is a radar map on which you can spot the zombies and prepare a rather nasty surprise. And remember: the only good zombie is a dead zombie!

Game features:

- Great weapons
- Nerve-racking gameplay
- Retina ready display
- High AI
- Different play modes
